languages.text: Снова дождь. Ненавижу дождь. Почему наша смена должна была быть именно сегодня?

traits.locale_text: Снова дождь. Ненавижу дождь. Почему наша смена должна была быть именно сегодня?

languages.text: "Опять дождь. Ненавижу. Почему нам работать всегда выпадает в дождь?"
"It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"
languages.original_text: "Опять дождь. Ненавижу. Почему нам работать всегда выпадает в дождь?"

traits.locale_text: "It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"
"It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"
"It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"
"It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"
"It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"

languages.text: "Es regnet schon wieder. Ich hasse es. Warum müssen wir immer im Regen arbeiten?"
languages.original_text: "It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"

traits.locale_text: "Es regnet schon wieder. Ich hasse es. Warum müssen wir immer im Regen arbeiten?"

languages.text: « Voilà qu'il recommence à pleuvoir. Je déteste ça. Pourquoi faut-il toujours qu'on bosse sous la pluie ? »
languages.original_text: "It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"

traits.locale_text: « Voilà qu'il recommence à pleuvoir. Je déteste ça. Pourquoi faut-il toujours qu'on bosse sous la pluie ? »

languages.text: “又下雨了，简直烦死了。为什么我们总是得冒雨干活？”
languages.original_text: "It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"

traits.locale_text: “又下雨了，简直烦死了。为什么我们总是得冒雨干活？”

languages.text: «Ya vuelve a llover. ¿Por qué siempre tenemos que trabajar cuando llueve?».
languages.original_text: "It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"

traits.locale_text: «Ya vuelve a llover. ¿Por qué siempre tenemos que trabajar cuando llueve?».

languages.text: 「また雨か。嫌になるな。なんで俺たちはいつも雨の中で働かなきゃならないんだ？」
languages.original_text: "It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"

traits.locale_text: 「また雨か。嫌になるな。なんで俺たちはいつも雨の中で働かなきゃならないんだ？」

languages.text: "Yine yağmur yağıyor... Nefret ediyorum yağmurdan. Niye hep yağmur altında çalışmamız gerekiyor?"
languages.original_text: "It's raining again. I hate it. Why do we always have to work in the rain?"

traits.locale_text: "Yine yağmur yağıyor... Nefret ediyorum yağmurdan. Niye hep yağmur altında çalışmamız gerekiyor?"
